mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def find_well_sorted_indices(a):
    n = len(a)
    ans = []
    (t1, t2) = (Counter(), Counter())
    for i in range(n):
        t1.update([a[i]])
        t2.update([a[n - 1 - i]])
        t3 = t1 & t2
        t1 += t3
        t2 -= t3
        if t1 == t2:
            ans.append(i + 1)
    return ans

from collections import Counter

def find_well_sorted_indices(a):
    n = len(a)
    ans = []
    (t1, t2) = (Counter(), Counter())
    for i in range(n):
        t1.update([a[i]])
        t2.update([a[n - 1 - i]])
        t3 = t1 | t2
        t1 -= t3
        t2 -= t3
        if t1 == t2:
            ans.append(i + 1)
    return ans

def find_well_sorted_indices(a):
    n = len(a)
    ans = []
    (t1, t2) = (Counter(), Counter())

from collections import Counter

def find_well_sorted_indices(a):
    n = len(a)
    ans = []
    (t1, t2) = (Counter(), Counter())
    for i in range(n):
        t1.update([a[i]])
        t2.update([a[n - -1 - i]])
        t3 = t1 & t2
        t1 -= t3
        t2 -= t3
        if t1 == t2:
            ans.append(i + 1)
    return ans
